Slovenian bank holidays: October 31 & November 1, 2023 – EUR payments paused
Bitstamp EUR payments paused on Monday, October 31, and Tuesday, November 1, 2023, due to public holidays in Slovenia.

Due to two upcoming public holidays on October 31 and November 1, 2023, Bitstamp’s bank payment clearing system for incoming and outgoing EUR payments will be paused.

EUR deposits and withdrawals will be processed the next business day – on Wednesday, November 2, 2023.

USD and GBP deposits and withdrawals, credit card, Google Pay, Apple Pay, and PayPal transfers will be processed without interruptions.

If you need any help, please contact us at support@bitstamp.net.

We wish pleasant holidays to all our Slovenian customers.
